ISSUE.TITLE: LTAR: many to many
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: On creating m2m (for example Film <> Actor), use just the table name on either side for the columns. Film m2m field should be called Actor, Actor m2m field should be called Film.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #2476 from nocodb/feat/view-import feat: support secondary view import

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: ManyToMany column naming - Add suffix `List` instead of `MMList` - Proper child table name - Cypress test case corrections re #2429 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
